title: (x) Fonts in Cadbury commercial - Hanseatic, Sauna {Mikey D}
content:
Hello ,

Could you please help me identify the two fonts in each image.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071226011917im_/http:/typophile.com/files/cad1_6361.PNG)

and i know this is not the correct place but the background on this image has the connotations of and old film start up does this have a specific name or description.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071226011917im_/http:/typophile.com/files/cad2_3862.PNG)

Thanks,

 [‹ (x) Freeware script font used in signature for message board - Forelle {Florian, Satya}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071226011917/http:/typophile.com/node/39386 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Constructed geometric techno font - Danube {Jan E} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071226011917/http:/typophile.com/node/39352 "Go to next forum topic")
author: wweisben

comments.content:
The bottom image is Sauna from:

[www.underware.nl](http://web.archive.org/web/20071226011917/http:/www.underware.nl/ "www.underware.nl")

For the top one  
Hanseatic from Linotype  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/hanseatic/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071226011917/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/hanseatic/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/hanseatic/")
